	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, innovative environment.
	Proximity to location is very important.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 monthly.

Method of Application

Human Resources Manager Job at Elvaridah Limited




        
    

        
        Elvaridah Limited - Our client, a FinTech Company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Human Resources Manager

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Client Industry: FinTech

About the Role
     

            
    




	We are seeking a proactive and experienced Human Resources Manager to join our dynamic team in the cryptocurrency industry.
	The ideal candidate will play a key role in managing HR operations, driving employee engagement, and ensuring compliance with HR policies and labor regulations.
	You will be responsible for building an efficient HR framework that supports our growth and evolving business needs.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage the end-to-end recruitment process including sourcing, interviewing, and onboarding.
	Develop and implement HR policies, procedures, and employee handbooks tailored to a fast- paced crypto/fintech environment.
	Handle employee relations, performance management, and conflict resolution.
	Oversee payroll processing, employee benefits, and statutory compliance.
	Support training, career development, and capacity-building initiatives.
	Maintain accurate employee records and HR databases.
	Ensure compliance with Nigerian labor laws and relevant industry standards.
	Partner with leadership to foster a positive workplace culture aligned with company values.
	Provide HR insights and data-driven recommendations to management.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related fields
	3 - 5 years of proven HR experience, preferably in fintech, cryptocurrency, or tech-driven industries.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian labor laws and HR best practices.
	Hands-on experience with HR software and tools.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, innovative environment.
	Proximity to location is very important.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: careers@elvaridah.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

	Ensure compliance with Nigerian labor laws and relevant industry standards.
	Partner with leadership to foster a positive workplace culture aligned with company values.
	Provide HR insights and data-driven recommendations to management.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related fields
	3 - 5 years of proven HR experience, preferably in fintech, cryptocurrency, or tech-driven industries.
	Strong knowledge of Nigerian labor laws and HR best practices.
	Hands-on experience with HR software and tools.
	Excellent communication, interpersonal, and problem-solving skills.
	Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, innovative environment.
	Proximity to location is very important.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CVs to: careers@elvaridah.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
